meanings.sent1: After drinking too much, he stumbled around the party looking shitfaced.
meanings.sent2: She was so shitfaced at the bar that she couldn't even walk straight.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over a bottle of wine, and now it's stumbling around like it's shitfaced.
meanings.sent4: The city lights blurred together in his vision, making everything look shitfaced.
meanings.sent5: The room spun around her, making her feel completely shitfaced.

meanings.definition: To become very drunk or intoxicated.
meanings.sent1: He tends to shitfaced every time he goes out with his friends.
meanings.sent2: They decided to stay in and get shitfaced on cheap beer.
meanings.sent3: The party was so wild that everyone ended up shitfaced by midnight.
meanings.sent4: The music was so loud that it felt like it was trying to shitfaced their senses.
meanings.sent5: The laughter and cheers filled the room as they all began to shitfaced together.
